cards.title: Fragmented Systems
cards.description: 85% of businesses use 10+ disconnected tools, leading to data silos and inefficiency.

cards.description: Employees spend 40% of their time on repetitive tasks that could be automated.

cards.title: Poor Integration
cards.description: 60% of businesses struggle with data sync issues between different platforms.

cards.description: Companies lose $37B annually due to poor workflow management and inefficient processes.
